Html: I saw the screen shots page https://mui.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=screenshots&referringTitle=Home. How can I change the backgrond of ModernWIndow?

You'll need to define a custom WindowBackgroundContent resource.

See also this tutorial on creating a custom theme and here is is full theme resource reference.

Finally, you can take a look at the mui demo app source code, it's where the screenshots come from.
